knifeBlockCut.name: Cut
knifeBlockCut.description:
Cut enemies for <y>50% damage</c>, <r>wounding</c> them for 6 seconds.
<r>Wounded</c> enemies take an extra <y>50% damage</c> from <b>all sources</c>.

pizza.name: Pizza!
pizza.description:
Increases the following stats:

<g>Max health</c> by <g>15% <c_stack>(+15% per stack).</c>
<g>Health regeneration</c> by <g>3</c> <c_stack>(+3 per stack)</c> <g>HP</c> per second.
<g>Armor</c> by <g>14 <c_stack>(+14 per stack).</c>
<y>Damage</c> by <y>15%</c> <c_stack>(+15% per stack).</c>
<y>Attack speed</c> by <y>25% <c_stack>(+25% per stack).</c>
<y>Critical strike chance</c> by <y>15% <c_stack>(+15% per stack).</c>
<b>Movement speed</c> by <b>28% <c_stack>(+28% per stack).</c>
<b>Jump height</c> by <b>25% <c_stack>(+25% per stack).</c>
pizza.story: It's PIZZA time! 30 years or it's FREE! FREE, I SAID! YES, FREE!

backupMissiles.name: Backup Missiles
backupMissiles.description: Shoot <y>3<c/> <c_stack>(+1 per stack)</c> <y>small missiles for 3x80% damage</c> every time an enemy spawns.
backupMissiles.story: Don't let anyone know we sent you these, we already had enough trouble with the UES Contact Light getting them in. Can't afford authorities on our tail now.

knockupFin.name: Knockup Fin
knockupFin.description: Elite enemies below <r>13%</c> <c_stack>(+13% per stack)</c> <r>health</c> are knocked up into the air and slammed back to the ground, <y>stunning</c> and dealing <y>damage equal to their remaining health</c> to nearby enemies.
knockupFin.destination:
Cage 255,
Preservation Center,
The Big Dipper
knockupFin.story:
We're sorry to say that the surgery was not a success. Big guy just couldn't handle the stress. 
I remember you said you loved his fins, so we're sending back the only thing that remains in tact. 
Take Care.

siphoningVase.name: Siphoning Vase
siphoningVase.description: <y>Tether</c> to the nearest <y>1</c> <c_stack>(+1 per stack)</c> enemies, dealing <y>100% damage</c> and <g>healing for 2.5% of your maximum health</c>.
siphoningVase.story:
Yo, man! How's it going? Personally, I'm doing fantastic! I've never felt so good.. Although, can't say the same about Cheryl...
She passed out a bit earlier. I'm nursing back to health now. Thank God Doc gave us these potions! /nAnyways, I found a super cool artifact we could research together! 
It's a weird vase, that has some tar inside, and when you shake it around, it looks like it's writhing around like some kind of animal! 
Take care man, we'll see you later!

amberMosquito.name: Amber Mosquito
amberMosquito.description: Reduces enemies' <g>maximum health</c> by <g>25%</c> <c_stack>(+10% per stack)</c>.
amberMosquito.destination:
Museum of Prehistory,
New Orleans,
Earth
amberMosquito.story: Now look at this BEAUTY! Imagine the kind of dinosaur DNA we could extract from such a specimen! Perhaps a T-Rex, or a Stegosaurus! Or even a Triceratops! I'm entrusting your team with this. Be careful now, this discovery could be GROUNDBREAKING in the right hands!

moltenCandy.name: Molten Candy
moltenCandy.pickup: Chance on hit to fire blobs of molten candy.
moltenCandy.description: Gain a <y>5%</c> chance on hit to fire <y>blobs of molten candy</c>, leaving <r>sticky puddles</c> when hitting the ground that <b>slow</c> and <y>burn for 100%</c> <c_stack>(+100% per stack)</c> <y>damage</c>.
moltenCandy.story: Hey, uhh.. we're going reship your candy, since according to your last message, it was 'so hot it burnt through your kitchen counter'? /nWhatever, dude. I don't get paid enough to care if people lie about their orders..

knifeBlock.name: Knife Block
knifeBlock.pickup: Replace your primary skill with a wounding knife slash. Throw the knife by activating again.
knifeBlock.description: <b>Replace your primary skill</c> with a <r>wounding</c> <y>knife slash</c>. <b>Throw the knife</c> by activating again. <b>Thrown knives</c> <r>bleed wounded</c> enemies for <y>4x100% damage</c>.
knifeBlock.story:
We're sorry for the inconvenience, your order was lost in transit. 
Our built-in HANDYTRAK(TM) systems TRAK'd(TM) your order: 'Down to a night club 5 blocks down from our factory'. 
They were located: 'on a dancefloor COVERED in vampire blood'.

This email was composed in part by our HANDYTRAK(TM) couriers, please let us know if they got anything wrong, and don't forget to give your courier, 'Stela' a positive rating for their hard work!

goldDust.name: Gold Dust
goldDust.pickup: Hit enemies drop gold. Spawn temporary items based on current gold upon activating the Teleporter.
goldDust.description: Enemies drop <y>10¢</c> <c_stack>(+10¢ per stack)</c> <y>gold</c> on hit. Scales with time. Up to <y>10 temporary items</c> spawn upon activating the Teleporter, based on <y>current gold</c>.

specialTreatment.name: Special Treatment
specialTreatment.pickup: Gain barrier after falling to low health. Barrier gives a temporary boost of speed.
specialTreatment.description: Falling under <r>25% health</c> heals <g>75%</c> of your <g>maximum barrier</c> once per stage. Increase <y>movement speed</c> by <b>25%</c> <c_stack>(+25% per stack)</c> when you have <g>barrier</c>.
specialTreatment.story:
Hello Mr. Cleus, I've heard you've been having more patients than usual. 
So, as a way to speed up the recuperation process, I've devloped this curative solution. We legally cannot call it medicine. I assure you, it has been throughly tested and it works a treat. 
Make sure to send any results back!

specialTreatmentConsumed.name: Empty Bottle
specialTreatmentConsumed.pickup: Barrier gives a temporary boost of speed.
specialTreatmentConsumed.description: Increase <y>movement speed</c> by <b>25%</c> <c_stack>(+25% per stack)</c> when you have <g>barrier</c>.
specialTreatmentConsumed.story:
Hello Mr. Cleus, I've heard you've been having more patients than usual. 
So, as a way to speed up the recuperation process, I've devloped this curative solution. We legally cannot call it medicine. I assure you, it has been throughly tested and it works a treat. 
Make sure to send any results back!

unstableManipulator.name: Unstable Manipulator
unstableManipulator.description: Increases <b>director stage credits</c> by <b>10%</c> <c_stack>(+10% per stack)</c>.
unstableManipulator.story:
I th??nk i mi?ht?v? mess?d with this pl?c? t?? much.?.. What h??e i d?ne... W?s playin? ??? wo?th it?
????????????????????????????????????????????

magiciansHat.name: Magician's Hat
magiciansHat.pickup: Consume an item in front of you. Recieve 2 temporary copies of that item by activating again.
magiciansHat.description: <y>Consume</c> a commmon, <g>uncommon</c>, <r>rare</c> or <y>boss</c> item in front of you. Gain <y>2 temporary copies</c> of that item by activating again, <b>lasting 30 seconds</c>. If the hat is dropped, <r>consumed items are dropped with it</c> as <y>2 temporary copies</c>, <b>lasting 80 seconds each</c>.
magiciansHat.story:
Pretty standard stuff, right? ANY magician worth his salt knows the old 'bunny-in-the-hat' trick. But they just kept coming. They all poured out of that.. that god-forsaken hat. One after another, they all fell out like a huge, fluffy tidal wave.. But then they all just disappeared! There must've been hundreds- no, THOUSANDS of them.. And now I'm here, 'cause everyone thinks I'm CRAZY. 

I swear to God, if I see another rabbit, maybe I WILL go crazy..
